alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued February 07 at 4:25AM MST until February 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one mile or less in areas of freezing fog. * WHERE...Upper Snake Plain and Eastern Highlands including Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon NM, Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Island Park, Kilgore, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, and Small. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. Flurries and light freezing drizzle will also exist creating slick road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
